alert.note: Alert for Admiralty Inlet Area; Bremerton and Vicinity; Everett and Vicinity; Hood Canal Area; San Juan County; Seattle and Vicinity; Western Skagit County; Western Whatcom County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued December 22 at 2:10PM PST until December 24 at 7:00AM PST by NWS Seattle
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM PST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Minor tidal overflow flooding possible around high tide on Thursday and Friday mornings. * WHERE...San Juan County, Western Whatcom County, Western Skagit County, Everett and Vicinity, Admiralty Inlet Area, Hood Canal Area, Seattle and Vicinity and Bremerton and Vicinity. * WHEN...Until 7 AM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding of lots, parks, and roads near the beaches is possible with only isolated road closures expected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...High tide at Seattle and Port Townsend is around 8 am Thursday and 9 am Friday. At Friday Harbor and Cherry Point the high tides are around 9 am Thursday and 10 am Friday. High tides will be around a foot above the tide table predictions Thursday and Friday.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
